summary:
She is a Defender, full perk with Block.

Body: CHSBHC Height 0.98 Weight 100
Location: Solitude - The Winking Skeever
Default Outfit: Elven Armor
Combat style: 1H Combat Warrior With Shield
Perk: Shield Wall, Power Bash, Deflect Arrows, Elemental Protection, Deadly Bash, Block Runner, Disarming Bash, Shield Char
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/HbQpDE8.jpg][/img][/center]
[center][youtube]H34pAWPQ79s[/youtube][youtube]krXr_GjrMIs[/youtube]
[color=#ffa07a][b]Thank to Slytra review video !![/b][/color][b] & [color=#00ffff]Thank to SkyttsTV's review video !![/color][/b][/center]

Hello! My name is [b]YuiH[/b](spell Yui "H", single H), I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English

*This mod is stand-alone follower,so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*

Show me some screenshot with her in your game, I will very very appreciate.

Filauria is my second made main character.
 
She is a elf, and I make her face not so perfect because she is a very elder elf,
so maybe you will feel her face a little bit ugly.
 
[b]Originally, I still have 2 more character, but I start to feeling the face data is too old, so I decide to remake them,
so Filauria is the final character.
 
Next character will be take a little bit longer,
That's all, I hope you like my all 4 followers.[/b]

Maybe see you in the YuiH Standalone Follower Season2.

[color=#ff8c00][size=5][b]Character[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00][b]Filauria[/b][/color]
She is a Defender, full perk with Block skill.

Body: CHSBHC Height 0.98 Weight 100
Location: Solitude - The Winking Skeever
Default Outfit: Elven Armor
Combat style: 1H Combat Warrior With Shield
Perk: Shield Wall, Power Bash, Deflect Arrows, Elemental Protection, Deadly Bash, Block Runner, Disarming Bash, Shield Charge, Juggernaut, Well Fitted, Tower of Strength, Conditioning, Matching Set, Armsman, Bladesman

[color=#ff8c00][size=5][b]Recommended Mod[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url]

[color=#ff8c00][b][size=5]Knowing issue[/size][/b][/color]
Q: The neck textures seem mismatch with body
A: The face textures is SG Female Texture Renewal and mix with ECE, and the body textures wasn't use the same texture set.

Report to me if her Spell/Perk list is too strong or too weak.

[color=#ff8c00][b][size=5]F&Q[/size][/b][/color]
[color=#ffff00]Q[/color]: I wish your follower has custom voice.
[color=#ff0000]A[/color]: I only have my own, I can't do it by myself, and I am new with CK, stand-alone follower is only I know how to make right now, I even don't know how to edit the dialogue in CK. And I have poor English.
[b]Follower is only I can make right now, I don't know how to make Companions. If you interest with support me, you are very welcome.[/b]

[color=#ff8c00][b][size=5]Credits[/size][/b][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39821/?]HRK ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7475/?]CHSBHC Conversions with BBP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female[/url]
MissAniThrope and chakaru11's True C Eyes
Thanks to author of the original hair meshes creator by NewSeaSims

[color=#ff8c00][b][size=5]Change log[/size][/b][/color]
2014.05.06 - Release. v0.2 - Fix textures missing.
